description: Not as many modes or statistics as Monkeytype, but it does its job well enough if you want to type words/sentences and get an accuracy and WPM out. Simple and clean much like most GTK4 apps nowadays.
summary: Alright alternative to typing test websites

description: Very nice interface and easy to start using! One feature that is missing is a guide how to hold the fingers and which fingers should press which keys. Good job!
Works as expected, looks very nice.
Looks nice w/ intuitive ux. I can type on it and it has a nice little arrow up when i do better. I like it a lot.
Great for offline typing tests. Simple and fast
summary: Nice and offline alternative to monkeytype

description: Great, super light, and fast typing app. Could have more customization options but what it currently has is perfectly usable.
summary: Does what is says, and does it really well

description:
As described in the title, this looks good and I like to use it. 
But, it could auto-indent white-spaces if you are training yourself on code. The code editor does that normally, and it's a bit annoying to spam the space bar. This would be a great improvement to me. 
Furthermore, it would be nice to add some statistics on how your typing abilities evolve (with a diagram). 
Also, the source could be used as a base for (or it could expand to) a great touch typing trainer where starters can learn basics. This is one thing that we still don't have as GTK4 app. 

But for what it claims to do, it's already great work!
summary: Good base for future touch typing trainers

description: I like everything about this app
The app does exactly what it advertises. It's great as a type trainer and to improve yourself in typing speed as well as accuracy.
I love this, usually i prefer native apps just because they are fast...
It's awesome! Would be nice if it adds historical charts and data as well.

As title says. Its simple and serves its purpose. Very nice looking app and very responsive. My rusty fingers struggled but that is okay. I have tried testing my skills using both English and Spanish. As someone else mentioned statistics would be great to track progress and see improvements. 

It would also be great if Modern Greek could be added to practice Greek writing for new learners. Great App overall!
It's a great app. It would be nice if you could save multiple custom exercises instead od just one.
Really like this app, specially how it looks!
Funciona genial y tiene una interfaz súper cuidada!
